main event: On July 15, 1958, a sighting of a round, white object the size of a dime was reported in Oliver Springs, Tennessee.
interesting points: The object appeared to fade gradually,It was brighter than the evening star,The object was traveling in a straight path,The sighting lasted for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes,The conclusion suggests it may have been an observation of the 1958 Br or B II.
witness description: Mr. RA, a draftsman from Knoxville, Tennessee
